org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.process.traversal.step

Interface TraversalParent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TraversalOptionParent<M,S,E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddEdgeStep, AddPropertyStep, AddVertexStartStep, AddVertexStep, AggregateStep, AndStep, BranchStep, ChooseStep, CoalesceStep, ConnectiveStep, DedupGlobalStep, EmptyStep, GroupCountSideEffectStep, GroupCountStep, GroupSideEffectStep, GroupSideEffectStepV3d0, GroupStep, GroupStepV3d0, LocalStep, MatchStep, NotStep, OrderGlobalStep, OrderLocalStep, OrStep, PageRankVertexProgramStep, PathFilterStep, PathStep, PeerPressureVertexProgramStep, ProjectStep, PropertyMapStep, RepeatStep, SackValueStep, SampleGlobalStep, SelectOneStep, SelectStep, StoreStep, TraversalFilterStep, TraversalFlatMapStep, TraversalMapStep, TraversalSideEffectStep, TraversalVertexProgramStep, TreeSideEffectStep, TreeStep, UnionStep, WherePredicateStep, WhereTraversalStep

extends AutoCloseable
